effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder by 2% stacking up to 8 times. Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot lose Winning Streak!, gain an additional stack of Winning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage per Winning Streak! stack.

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot lose Winning Streak!, gain an additional stack of Winning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage per Winning Streak! stack.

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot lose Winning Streak!, gain an additional stack of Winning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage per Winning Streak! stack.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Footpads of the Fang

sockets.display_string: Hop onto a plank of wood with a haphazard shadowflame rocket attachment. Absolutely nothing could go wrong, but if it did, deal 635,106 Shadowflame damage split between you and enemies caught in the theoretical blast.

spells.description: Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +5% Damage Reduction when affected by Crowd Control

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Agility by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
